Description: Smite hits reduce its own cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade1.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> per target hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade1.NumberOfTrackedHits]} targets)</font>

Grants a bonus based on what <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">shield type</font> is equipped:
	

•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Round Shield</font> - Smite deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade2.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more base weapon damage.
	
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Kite Shield</font> - Smite will now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stagger</font> targets hit, but damage is reduced to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Slam_Stagger.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.
	
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Tower Shield</font> - Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_Upgrade_Fortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f"> fortfy</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_Upgrade_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font> when smite is activated. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>

Hitting targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_StackingRoot_Tracker.AddOnStackSize]}</font> times with arcane vortex will inflict them with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">immobilizing</font> them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_StackingRoot.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Hitting a target with arcane vortex grants a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font> on self, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.StackMax]} stacks)</font> 
	\n\nAllies within the radius of the attack are granted a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Ally.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Ally.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Targets hit with the first attack of burst are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font>, reducing their movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

The follow up attack extends the duration of all debilitate status effects (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Burst_Upgrade2.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.

The follow up attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">consumes</font> one stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Impairment</font> on the target hit, triggering a chain that will bounce up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Burst_ChainHeal.MaxChainNum]}</font> times to allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Burst_ChainHeal.Radius]}m</font> of player, granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_HealChain.ModDmgBasedMultValue_ForTooltip * 100]}%</font> of its total damage as <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">health</font> to each ally it chains to, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_HealChain_Self.ModDmgBasedMultValue_ForTooltip * 100]}%</font> of its total damage to self. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

Hitting a target with a basic attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_AfterAbilityHeavy.BaseDuration]}s</font> of using an ability will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">exhaust</font>, reducing stamina regen rate by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_Exhaust.StaminaRate * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_Exhaust.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Being hit or blocking a hit from a melee attack while above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive4.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Impairment</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s</font> on the attacker, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage per second and inflicting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font>, reducing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)</font> \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive4.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>

While at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, all flail attacks grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> lifesteal while attacking targets. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.NumberOfTrackedHits]} targets)</font>
	\n\nWhile above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5_Helper.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, all flail attacks extend the duration of damage over time effects on targets by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5_Helper.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.

When no allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Passive_PerNearbyAlly_Detection.Radius]}m</font>, all flail attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive6.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more base damage.
	\n\nWhen 1 or more allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Passive_PerNearbyAlly_Detection.Radius]}m</font>, they gain empower, increasing their damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_NearbyAlly_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>.

While within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Ultimate_PerNearby_Detection.Radius]}m</font> of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Ultimate_Flail_Eldritch.NumAroundMe]}</font> or more allies, grant passive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing</font> to self and all allies that heals for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_HealOverTime.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_HealOverTime.TickRate]}</font> seconds. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)</font>

Hitting a target with any of barrage's hits will grant a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font>. The fortify has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.BaseDuration]}s</font> duration, and every hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.BaseDuration]}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.DurationMax]}s</font>.
	\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Moving through targets with the Bulldoze upgrade will also extend the duration of the effect)</font>

Barrage can now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">block</font> attacks while charging forward without consuming stamina, and will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">push</font> all enemies moved through to the side. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This will also cause the targets moved through to be taunted if using a carnelian gem)</font>

Barrage's attack now triggers a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Slam_Barrage_AOE.Radius]}m</font> blast of energy around the target on hit, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Charge_AOE.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage to all nearby targets, and granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> to all allies within the radius, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Fortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Swing the Flail forward latching onto a target dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Trip.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_strike_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knocking</font> them to the ground.

Tripping a target applies a special debuff to the target lasting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_EnemyDebuff_AllyDoTDurReduction.BaseDuration]}s</font>. Allies that hit the affected enemy will reduce the duration of all damage over time effects on themselves by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10%</font> per hit while active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_AllyDoTDurRed.ApplicationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>

Adds a follow up <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heavy</font> attack, that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Trip_FollowUp.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.

Stamina damage taken is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade1_Helper.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_BlockTracker.BaseDuration]}s</font> after activating block. \n\nAdditionally, blocking hits while the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reinforced fortify</font> from Warding Bludgeon is active will Inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f"> Impairment</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s</font> on the attacker, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage per second and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weakening</font> them, reducing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)</font>

Upon hitting a enemy target, a nearby ally within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_DefensiveStrike_ConnectChain.Radius]}m</font> is selected and you become linked to them. While the connection is active, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, increasing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>, and you both gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage absorption</font>, reducing damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Absorption.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Absorption.BaseDuration]}s</font>, or until players are more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Ally.Radius]}m</font> apart from each other.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

While at or above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1_Helper.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, reduce damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1_Helper.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>.
	\n\nWhile below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt while blocking by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>.

The first target hit with a heavy attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_AfterAbilityHeavy.BaseDuration]}s</font> of using an ability will cleanse <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive2.NumStatusEffectStacksToRemove]}</font> stack of any debuff from self, and will also inflict a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Impairment</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s</font> to the target hit, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_arcane_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage per second and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weakening</font> them, reducing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)</font>

While stamina is at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.MyStaminaPercent]}%</font>, activating an ability will grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.Stamina]}</font> stamina. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>

When blocking a hit, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.BaseDuration]}s</font> tracking status effect, every blocked hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.BaseDuration]}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.DurationMax]}s</font>, and while the effect is active, gain variable damage absorption based on current health percent and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">equip load</font>:
	\n\n•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heavy</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases
	\n•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Medium</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper1.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases
	\n•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Light</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper2.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases

Increase your max health by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive6.PhysicalArmorMaxHealthMod * 100]}%</font> of your physical armor rating while the flail is equipped.\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect is active as long as the flail is equipped, even if the flail is sheathed)</font>

Hitting a target with an <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">ability</font> while within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Ultimate_ChainDamageSplit.Radius]}m</font> of an ally, applies a status effect linking yourself and a single ally to each other for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.BaseDuration]}s</font>. While the effect is active the ally will only take <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.DamageSplitTaken * 100]}%</font> of the incoming damage and causing you to inherit <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.DamageSplitTakenBySource * 100]}%</font> of the incoming damage they didn't take. 
	\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cannot be applied to targets that already have this effect, or self if you already have the effect applied to an ally)</font>
